dooyit.ui

Class UIHelpBox

  • java.lang.Object
    • dooyit.ui.UIHelpBox

  • public class UIHelpBox
extends java.lang.Object
    The UIHelpBox class contains the methods to initialize the help box, control its visibility and set the message to be displayed.
    Since:
    2016-04-10
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    Wu Wenqi

    • Method Detail

      • initialize

        private void initialize()
        This method is used to initialize UIHelpBox class. It is used by the constructor.

      • initTitle

        private void initTitle()
        This method is used to initialize the help box's title. It is used by the initialize method.

      • initLeftContent

        private void initLeftContent()
        This method is used to initialize the left-sided content of the help box. It is used by the initialize method.

      • initRightContent

        private void initRightContent()
        This method is used to initialize the right-sided content of the help box. It is used by the initialize method.

      • initContentWrapper

        private void initContentWrapper()
        This method is used to initialize the content wrapper. It can only be called after the left- and right-sided content views have been initialized. It is used by the initialize method.

      • initCloseLabel

        private void initCloseLabel()
        This method is used to initialize the close button. It is used by the initialize method.

      • initHelpBox

        private void initHelpBox()
        This method is used to initialize the help box view. It is used by the initialize method.

      • makeLabel

        private javafx.scene.control.Label makeLabel(java.lang.String s)
        This method is used to create and return a label that is to be displayed on the left- and right-sided content views.
        Parameters:
        s - The text to set for the label.
        Returns:
        A label with s as its text.

      • isShowing

        protected boolean isShowing()
        This method is used to check if the help box is visible.
        Returns:
        True if help box is visible, False otherwise.

      • updatePosition

        protected void updatePosition(double stageX,
                              double stageY,
                              double stageWidth,
                              double stageHeight)
        This method is used to update the position of the help box.
        Parameters:
        stageX - The x-coordinate of the stage of the application scene.
        stageY - The y-coordinate of the stage of the application scene.
        stageWidth - The stage width of the application scene.
        stageHeight - The stage height of the application scene.

      • show

        protected void show(javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage)
        This method is used to show the help box.
        Parameters:
        primaryStage - The stage to show the help box in.

      • tempHide

        protected void tempHide()
        This method is used to temporarily hide the help box.

      • hide

        protected void hide()
        This method is used to hide the help box.

      • isOn

        protected boolean isOn()
        This method is used to retrieve the visibility attribute of the help box.
        Returns:
        True if help box should be visible to user, False otherwise.
